Title: Creates the public/private security camera fund
Summary: Creates the public/private security camera fund; provides that ten million dollars annually shall be used for grants related to providing video surveillance systems for businesses or not-for-profit corporations in high crime areas of the state; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the public/private security camera fund; and making an appropriation therefor
